name: Complete Willow without using the mouse
Let McGonagall fall down during the second Nick cutscene
Complete Diffindo without using the mouse
Get 5 secrets as Harry in Slytherin
Complete a Quidditch game before learning how to fly
Cast on 5 Lumos statues during Spongify
Take no damage in the Basilisk fight
Spawn 12 gnomes in the girl's bathroom
Talk to Percy, Hagrid, Snape, and Madam Pomfrey
Finish a spell challenge with a gnome in your hand
Hit 8 different Lumos statues in Goyle
Activate both secrets in Willow from out of bounds
